thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: Ron Wallach
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Ron Wallach

author: Ron Wallach
title: Ron Wallach
text: my order was handled quickly and professionally. When you call you are put in touch with an optician and she (Nancy in my case) gets your Rx info. I chose 'Wiley X" for wind protection when I am riding. Much better wind protection than my pair of PanOptx. And Kaiser had these glasses only in Amber for two hundred dollars more. So I got a great result and saved Two hundred dollars. Kaiser only had amber here I was able to choose a red tone, which transmits just enough light.
